thread.title: Bushnell Named Affiliate Partner of 2025 Precision Rifle Series
thread.title_full: Bushnell Named Affiliate Partner of 2025 Precision Rifle Series

title: Bushnell Named Affiliate Partner of 2025 Precision Rifle Series
text:
|
The Precision Rifle Series is proud to announce Bushnell as an official affiliate partner and the official scope of the 2025 season.
With over 75 years of expertise in the optics industry, Bushnell continues to deliver high-performance optics trusted by competitive shooters, hunters, and outdoor enthusiasts alike. This partnership with PRS will provide shooters with access to industry-leading optics to help elevate their performance on the range throughout the season.
“We are excited to welcome Bushnell as an official affiliate partner and the official scope of the 2025 PRS season,” said Ken Wheeler, Director of the Precision Rifle Series. “Bushnell has long been a trusted name in the optics industry, and their commitment to quality and innovation perfectly aligns with the PRS mission. Their optics are the ideal choice for competitors looking to gain the edge in the highly competitive world of precision rifle shooting.”
Bushnell's extensive lineup of precision optics is known for its clarity, advanced reticles, and rugged durability. Whether it's long-range engagements or rapid target transitions, Bushnell’s optics deliver the performance that shooters rely on during PRS events.
Bushnell has been a trusted leader in optics, offering a comprehensive lineup of high-performance products, including riflescopes, binoculars, rangefinders, and spotting scopes. Known for their innovation and exceptional quality, Bushnell’s optics are relied upon by shooters and outdoor enthusiasts who demand unmatched precision, reliability, and durability in any environment.
The PRS values its partnership with the Bushnell Team and looks forward to working together to support its members, elevate national Pro Series competitions, and contribute to the growth of the sport. In 2025, the PRS will host 50 national-level precision rifle competitions, culminating in the PRS Pro Series Finale on November 1-2, 2025, at WAR Rifles – Geissele Range in Tremont, Pennsylvania, where Bushnell will proudly serve as a sponsor.
For more information on the Precision Rifle Series, visit: https://www.precisionrifleseries.com/
To learn more about Bushnell please visit: https://www.bushnell.com/
Press Release Contact: Camdyn Powers
Precision Rifle Series Marketing Specialist
E-mail: Camdyn.powers@precisionrifleseries.com
Connect with the PRS on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PRS.series
Connect with the PRS on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/precisionrifleseries/
